tool_description: The Levenshtein-based keyword clustering API uses a graph-based approach to cluster words with similar spellings.
name: Word Clustering Service
title: Word Clustering Service

api_list.name: clusterKeywords
api_list.description: By using the clusterKeywords endpoint, users can detect clusters within a list that they submit to the API. The API will return the original list along with a corresponding cluster name assigned to each element of the list.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://word-clustering-service.p.rapidapi.com/clusteringjob/execute-cluster-job"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "word-clustering-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: highlightDuplicates
api_list.description: The highlightDuplicates endpoint allows users to identify duplicate keywords within a submitted list. The API returns a list of the identified duplicates to the user, highlighting any redundant or repeated information in the original data set.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://word-clustering-service.p.rapidapi.com/clusteringjob/execute-highlight-job"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "word-clustering-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
